meta.name: Support Triage Router
meta.description: Routes incoming support text to bug, feature, or billing lanes.

data.label: Classify Request
data.prompt: Pick route bug, feature, or billing. Bug = defects, errors, crashes, regressions. Feature = requests, improvements. Billing = payments, invoices, pricing, refunds.

data.label: Bug Intake
data.prompt: Act as a support triager for a BUG report. Return bullet points for: observed behavior, expected behavior, reproduction steps, environment, logs/IDs.

data.label: Feature Intake
data.prompt: Act as a PM helper for a FEATURE idea. Return bullet points for: problem, user impact, desired outcome, constraints, urgency.

data.label: Billing Intake
data.prompt: Act as billing support. Return bullet points for: account identifiers, charge/invoice IDs, timeline of issue, requested action, proof/evidence gathered.
